posts.post_title: Lot of 3 Christy Mathewson Cards for Sale, M116 and T206
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Chris Buckler
For Sale: lot of (3) Christy Mathewson cards. All cards are Graded/Authenticated.

1910-11 M116 Christy Mathewson NY Nationals GAI 2. 

1909 T206 Christy Mathewson Portrait PSA PR 1. Piedmont Back.

1909 T206 Christy Mathewson Dark Cap PSA 1. Piedmont Back.

$950 shipped for the group. Paypal is ok.

Contact me at bucklercards@yahoo.com
